pull.title: doc: describe onlynet option in doc/tor.md
pull.body:
as per http://www.erisian.com.au/bitcoin-core-dev/log-2019-04-11.html#l-102.

Description adapted from [/src/init.cpp#L429](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/src/init.cpp#L429).

Please verify if this is the best place to add it in the documentation.

This commit also fixes a typo in doc/dependencies.md.

[skip ci]

events.body: Thanks for reviewing! Updated as per feedback.
If merged, might be worth backporting to 0.18.0 before final.

<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#15778](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/15778.html) ([wallet] Move maxtxfee from node to wallet by jnewbery)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.
DrahtBot appears to be mistaken; the other PR does not change these 2 documentation files. Perhaps it is from the link to source code in the commit message or the PR description?

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -27,6 +27,11 @@ outgoing connections, but more is possible.
 	-seednode=X     SOCKS5. In Tor mode, such addresses can also be exchanged with
 	                other P2P nodes.
 
+	-onlynet=onion  Make outgoing connections only through .onion addresses. Incoming
comments.body: I'd say: only *to* `.onion` addresses, not through (reserve that word for the proxy), but that's a minor thing
